description: Standard project setup issues for beads-enabled projects

issues.title: {{PROJECT_NAME}} Initial Setup
issues.description: Complete initial project setup including development environment, documentation, and first working feature.

issues.title: Configure development environment
issues.description:
Set up the development environment:
- Install required dependencies
- Configure editor/IDE settings
- Verify build/run commands work
- Document any environment-specific setup steps

issues.title: Establish project structure
issues.description:
Create the standard directory structure:
- src/ for source code
- tests/ for test files
- docs/ for documentation
- Add placeholder files where appropriate

issues.title: Set up testing framework
issues.description:
Configure the testing framework:
- Install test runner and assertion library
- Create first example test
- Verify tests can be run from command line
- Add test command to documentation

issues.title: Configure CI/CD pipeline
issues.description:
Set up continuous integration:
- Create GitHub Actions workflow (or equivalent)
- Configure automated testing on push/PR
- Add build status badge to README

issues.title: Create initial documentation
issues.description:
Write essential documentation:
- Update README with project-specific details
- Document installation/setup steps
- Add usage examples
- Include contribution guidelines

issues.title: Implement first working feature
issues.description:
Build the first functional feature to validate the project setup:
- Implement a minimal but complete feature
- Write tests for the feature
- Verify end-to-end functionality
- This proves the project infrastructure works
